org-tagline: Kulwela Zyilungelo, Kujaka Kuzyiba, Kusandula Zyindi
hero-description: Albinism Foundation Zambia yakabambana kulwela zyilungelo zyabantu baliansikila, kupandula kuzyiba, akujaka mulukuta ulalangilana uko kufumbwa wumwi akutakata.
mission-statement: Kulwela zyilungelo, bulemekelo, akujatanizya kwabantu baliansikila muZambia kwindilila makatazyo akulaangila kuzyiba, kulwela milawo, zisebenzyo zyabuzuuminzi, azinchiito zyakusandula mulukuta.
focus-rights-desc: Kukatazya kusandulwa kwamilawo akuchengetedwa kwamulawo kuti tujane zyilungelo zyakafwanana amakani abantu boonse baliansikila.
focus-awareness-desc: Kulaangila milukuta yamansikila kuti tulwane antambi, myeelo itakachena, akubeela kwindilila zinchiito zyakuleka.
focus-support-desc: Kupa zisebenzyo zyachisemo kubikula sunscreen, zifuko zyachenjelo, akutongolosya kutambula kabotu kazubomi.
focus-education-desc: Kuona kuti baana baliansikila banjane mkani wakutambula kusikila kwabotu amatolosyo akulungama azinchiito zyabuzuuminzi.
news-1-title: AFZ Iyamba Katazyo Koonse Kaakulaangila Kuzyiba
news-1-excerpt: Katazyo kesu kamanene kaakulaangila kuzyiba kasika mumilukuta yamumafulo muZambia kuti tulwane kubeela akupandula kunyumfwana.
news-2-title: Buwindi Bwamulawo: Zikakilo Zilizyasanu Zyabuzuuminzi Zyapegwa Mvuumo
news-2-excerpt: Gamente yapegwa mvuumo kuzikakilo zilizyasanu zyamulawo zyakuchengeteza bantu baliansikila kubuziba abukaindu.
news-3-excerpt: AFZ yajongonya zinchiito zyachebo chakusikila kuti zijatanye basikila 200 babonjelwe baliansikila kuzisi zyoonse.
cta-description: Twaamwi, tuyanda kujaka Zambia uko bantu baliansikila bakkale abulemekelo, bufwanane, amakani.
address: [Chalo Chaofisi yaAFZ - Chafwilide kusandululwa achalo chachimuli]
awareness-description: Twaamwi, tulaabulaangula bwiko akukomeeka myeelo itakachena yamansikila. Kwindilila kulangila, kulwela, akuzuuminzi mwamulukuta, tulajaka nyika uko muntu uumwi auumwi ulaansikila uyanda kukkala abulemekelo, bufwanane, akuyeeya.
donate-page-description: Zipo zyanu zilazunika kulwela zyilungelo, bulemu, akujatanizya kwabatu balyaansikila muZambia. Zipo zyilizyonse zilajaka musiyano mukujaka citundu chijatanizyigwa.
impact-desc-workshop: Kulipila kampani yakulaangila kuzyiba mumuzi uumwi
impact-desc-education: Kuzunika zintu zyakusikila zya bana 10 balyaansikila
security-note: ðŸ”’ Zipo zyako zilachengetedwe bwino. Ulafalisigwa kumalo akachengetedwa akulipila.
alternative-volunteer-desc: Jatania mukwebo wesu wabashanduki azunika amambo ako.
alternative-corporate-desc: Caale naasu pakujanana kwabantu bamubombelo, CSR, akuupa chiindi muchitundu.
alternative-supplies-desc: Upa sunscreen, zifuko zyakulinda, zisebenzyo zyakusikila, nano zintu zyambi zifunikila.
slide-1-desc: AFZ yapa sunscreen kubana balyaansikila muZambia yoonse.
slide-2-desc: Mwana uumwi auumwi ufwiile kulindidwa kuzyuba. AFZ yalanga kuti takuli uukasiyigwa.
slide-3-desc: Kubomba lyoonse amyunzi, busimba, abacaali kulwela zyilungelo zyabantu balyaansikila.
slide-4-desc: Bungwe lyesu lyapeela lyalabomba takasweka kukonzya akulunga nzila zyakulwela.
slide-5-desc: Mansikila alacitika mukujaka pabuumi byoonse, kupepesha buluya bwabusiyani bwamambobeele.

hero.title: Zyachitika amilimu
hero.subtitle: Jatania kuzyachitika zyesu zyakulwela, makampani, amilimu yamulukuta muZambia yoonse

hero.title: Sanduku Lyazisebenzyo amalo Akusikila
hero.subtitle: Wana zisebenzyo zyakutongolosya, malangizo, azisebenzyo zakuzunika bungwe lyabantu balyaansikila
